function.name: GetRoundness
function.desc: Returns the corner roundness of this element.

function.name: SetRoundness
function.desc: Changes the corner roundness of this element. Can't be smaller than 0 or higher than 6. Higher values mean more roundness, but also more expensive to render.

function.name: GetCornerSize
function.desc: Returns the area-size of the corners that will be rounded.

function.name: SetCornerSize
function.desc: Changes the area-size of the corners that will be rounded.

function.name: SetRoundTopRight
function.desc: If set to ''true'', the top right corner of the element will be drawn rounded.

function.name: IsTopRightRound
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the upper right corner of this element is round.

function.name: SetRoundTopLeft
function.desc: If set to ''true'', the top left corner of the element will be drawn rounded.

function.name: IsTopLeftRound
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the upper left corner of this element is round.

function.name: SetRoundBottomLeft
function.desc: If set to ''true'', the bottom left corner of the element will be drawn rounded.

function.name: IsBottomLeftRound
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the bottom left corner of this element is round.

function.name: SetRoundBottomRight
function.desc: If set to ''true'', the bottom right corner of the element will be drawn rounded.

function.name: IsBottomRightRound
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the bottom right corner of this element is round.
